A902 => 0002FE5E
01FBB80

4e4c => hablados
5b8a => nombres 146208 + D0 (1B3864 en carnival)
25e8 => talkie options (and sayings) A5+2 = offset
4e50 => talk start A5 + 4
77e6 => A3 => nombre lugar

blake max size = 17744-17703

0FD4B0 => off lugares blake + num * $14
fc9f4 => pointer zones
blake (objetos): 146204 + (D0-1) * 8 + 4

30f12 tiles letras

;BIG LETTERS BLOOD UP-DOWN -2
;A = 057C-0597 B = 057D-0598 C = 057E-0599 D = 057F-059A
;E = 0580-059B F = 0581-059C G = 0582-059D H = 0583-059E
;I = 0584-059F J = 0585-05A0 K = 0586-05A1 L = 0587-05A2
